features: Healthy Red Blood Cells; NaturesPlus Hema-Plex Iron combines iron with powerful, blood health-boosting cofactors like vitamin C & synergistic bioflavonoids to support total blood health
Slow-Release Tablets; Each serving delivers 85 mg of high-potency chelated iron in slow-release tablets for greater absorption
Mild & Gentle; The iron in this supplement is easy on the stomach
Free From Allergens; This formula is free from all of the major allergens identified in the U.S. Food Allergen Labeling and Consumer Protection Act, as well as artificial colors and preservatives
Quality Manufacturing; Our state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities maintain adherence to superior standards and are FDA and NSF registered

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Maximum Potency HEMA-PLEX iron supports fast, potent supplementation by including a bioflavonoid complex to enhance mineral utilization, as well as a broad spectrum of essential cofactors to maximize effectiveness.* Commitment to Quality We strive to bring consumers smart, high-quality supplements based on solid research and high formulation standards. That’s why every NaturesPlus bottle says, “Manufactured with LOVE.” It’s just our way of ensuring that our products will live up to the quality you expect. Easy on the Stomach Taking iron can be rough on the digestive system. Our gentle formula makes iron supplementation an easy, mild experience.*

Hema-Plex Chewable Tablets Hema-Plex Slow-Release Mini-Tabs Hema-Plex Fast-Acting Softgels Hema-Plex Mixed Berry-Flavored Liquid Key Ingredients Iron (as ferrous fumarate), Vitamins C, E, B1, B2, B6, B12, Pantothenic Acid, Folate, Niacin, L-Glutamine, Zinc, Manganese, Calcium, Beet Iron (as amino acid chelate/complex), Vitamins C, E, B1, B2, B6, B12, Pantothenic Acid, Folate, Niacin, Riboflavin, L-Glutamine, Zinc, Selenium, Manganese, Calcium, Beet Iron (as ferrous biglycinate chelate), Vitamins C, E, B1, B2, B6, B12, Pantothenic Acid, Niacin, L-Cysteine, Zinc, Calcium, Selenium, Copper, Manganese, Beet Iron (as ferrous biglycinate chelate), Vitamins C, B1, B2, B6, B12, Pantothenic Acid, Folate, Niacin, L-Cysteine, Cranberry Fruit Extract Vegan ✓ ✓ ✓ Gluten Free ✓ ✓ ✓ Iron per Serving 85 mg 85 mg 85 mg 18 mg Servings per Container 20 Servings 30 Servings 20 Servings 25 Servings

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently found out I have iron deficiency anemia. The doctor prescribed standard iron pills twice daily but they seriously upset my stomach and made me irregular, to put it mildly. I switched to these and 5 weeks later, my iron levels had returned to normal. Theyre gentle, didnt give me any intestinal issues, and my energy level increased a LOT. So glad I bought these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Arrived today. Took two and I feel more energy already.
reviews.reviewText: What magic is in this pill?I've been feeling tired quite a bit lately and it occurred to me to work on my iron levels, as I've had trouble with anemia in the past.I tried three different types of iron supplements, but this one works so well that I felt a difference within minutes.Speculation: it's the high iron in combination with the other ingredients, such as the high B12. There's also a bit of Vitamin C. Lots of good stuff in this one pill.It's inexpensive, too. I think I'll stock up on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best quality item
reviews.reviewText: Shelf life is fresh and with a margin! Everything is fine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Latest lab results showed the combination of vitamin c and slow release iron really works. No stomach issues like regular iron does. First time in years I havent needed a quarterly iron infusion. I dont like that there are multiple variations in in dosage levels but packaging looks exactly the same. Manufactorer needs to clearly mark packaging so you can tell which version you are selecting. Would prefer two smaller tablets as one dose rather than one horse pill size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I feel a lot Better Since I Began Taking This Supplement
reviews.reviewText: I had been struggling with low energy for a long time. I tried this supplement based on a friend's recommendation, and after a few weeks, my fatigue went away. The pill is rather large, so I usually break it in half to make it easier to swallow. I also take it while I am eating breakfast in the morning to improve absorption. I take this supplement every day and my family and friends say that I am not as pale and look so much better! More importantly, I feel great now!

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does not hurt my stomach
reviews.reviewText: Seems to be easier on the stomach than harder tablets. I prefer the soft gels like these now

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best Iron!!
reviews.reviewText: I recommend this product to anyone needing iron, there are no side effects due to sustain release and the hema has all other ingredients to support healthy blood counts, my iron use to be low and 1 box made a difference, I keep this now at all times, it makes you very regular as well, highly suggest!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hope it works
reviews.reviewText: Dr said to take 1 pill. Didn't read label that 1 serving is 3 pills! Hope my level goes back up !
I feel so much better within a month of consuming this product. Definitely try for people who are curious
